channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Good News, Students! Dining Halls Now Open for Late Lunch
item.description: You asked, we listened! Starting August 24th, Commons and Russell Sage dining halls will remain open for lunch later to better fit your schedules.
item.author: Students

item.title: First Gen & BIPOC Students Ice Cream Social | Sept 4th
item.description: Join us in Academy Hall 4600 on Thursday, September 4th between 4-6 PM for some free ice cream! Meet faculty & staff who can help you throughout your time at RPI!
item.author: Students

item.title: GEM Student Fall Kick-Off
item.description: Join us Friday, August 29 in Sage 3510 from 4:30pm-7:30pm. The Games and Experiential Media Department will be holding a fall kick-off event to welcome new and returning majors, featuring pizza, vintage console games, party games, board games, miniature war-gaming, and a marathon of the campiest video game movies and shows of all time. All GEM and CGD students and alumni are welcome!
item.author: Community

item.title: Faculty Spotlight on Research & Impact webinar series-Rich Radke | Sept. 10
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 10, 2025 2:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Faculty Spotlight on Research & Impact - where Engineering Meets the World. Do you know how RPI Engineering faculty are shaping the future? In just 20 minutes, you’ll discover how their research is changing the world! Join us to learn how TED Talk meets research presented in PechaKucha style! Open to ALL (students, faculty, staff, alum, and all community members)
item.author: Community

item.title: BME Seminar Series | Sept. 11
item.description: Date: Thursday, September 11, 2025 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - Professor Joel Voldman from MIT lectures on Microfluidic Tools for Assaying Immune System Function
item.author: Community

item.title: RAA Entrepreneurship Series | Colleen Costello ’12 | Sept. 16
item.description: Date: 9/16/2025 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM The Rensselaer Alumni Association in 2024 announced a 3-part speaker series on Entrepreneurship and Venture Capital. In our third and final session, Charting the long-term course, we will be highlighting the work of Colleen Costello ’12, co-founder of Vyv, a company focused on inventing smarter ways to slow the spread of microbes to make the world a better place.
item.author: Community

item.title: Permit Enforcement Resumes: September 2, 2025
item.description: All parking gates will be fully operational, and regular enforcement of parking permit policies will resume. Please ensure you are parked in your designated areas and that your permit is active.

item.title: MBA for Professionals Review with Rensselaer at Work | Sept. 11
item.description:
Date: Thursday, September 11, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Learn to lead from every aspect of an organization with a real-world MBA experience. Prepare to lead the most dynamic and innovative organizations. Engage, involve, motivate, and lead others to reach their fullest potential. Join Rensselaer Dean Aric Krause, Ph.
